document.full_text: internet video company hulu is on track to nearly double its revenue to $500 million and bring its subscriber count to more than 1 million this year, its top executive wrote in a blog post on monday.
document.title: hulu on pace to have more than 1 million subscribers
lines_and_colors: internet video company hulu is on track to nearly double its revenue to $500 million and bring its subscriber count to more than 1 million this year, its top executive wrote in a blog post on monday.
